website_summaries.verdict: It may not sound great, but the Buckshot Pro is a versatile little wireless speaker.
pros: The Outdoor Tech Buckshot Pro is pocket-size water-resistant portable Bluetooth speaker that incorporates a detachable a lighting component and can also be used to charge your smartphone
It offers an above-average 10 hours of battery life and comes with a bicycle handlebar mount accessory
cons: a little expensive for what it is

customer_reviews.title: works great! great product
customer_reviews.text: works great! great product. battery is long lasting. sounds much better than the original buckshot...better bass. Bass is not great but better than original. But for such a small speaker i am impressed. light and attached to bike easily. Charging works good. Light has many applications and could make an excellent emergency light, flashlight, camping light, or bike light (in strobe mode).
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Kern

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality and volume is barely adequate but it is a solid, well made device along with being quite useful.
customer_reviews.text: I was underwhelmed by the sound volume and quality *** but *** it is adequate. The additional features, flashlight & power pack, really round out the feature list. I have used it to charge a number of dead Android and mobile devices along with the inherent safety of the flashlight. I keep the Buckshot Pro in the car as a battery backup for our cell phones. (just in case the cell *and* car battery is dead...happens in very cold weather) If you want to have listen to music in the car from your phone, you are ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: John Connors

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend to a cyclist friend.
customer_reviews.text: As a cyclist, the sound and light get the job done for city riding, but if I had to choose I would look elsewhere. By the way, I have a Buckshot 2.0 which is why I bought this model, and the sound quality is lower. The product is a good idea, but the execution doesn't match it.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Ignacio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome awesome awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker! Grea5 for bike rides and to just keep in you all the time. Very rugged and durable. So much so that I lost the first one I ordered almost 2 months ago at a friend's party and it was found outside under some plants and with a charge it works perfectly. Now I have 2 of them. Sounds is good for the little speaker and the light is super bright. I highly recommend this so do the people I ride with lol.
customer_reviews.author: WAS82

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: The body of the Buckshot has separated into 2 pieces that were poorly glued together. No service to be found.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J Schultz

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: I'm crazy about this device on my bicycle. It's sturdy, loud, multifunction lights and fantastic battery life. No frills set up. Sound is loud and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Cheops75

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this thing is awesome, decent speaker, great flashlight, and a convenient power bank. all in one rugged package.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Jiles

customer_reviews.title: I love this little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this little speaker! I use it mountain biking and it works great unless the trail is super bumpy or gnarly, then it ends up flopping around a bit. I use it on my stroller when walking baby, or when hiking. So many uses!
customer_reviews.author: KellyH

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. The power just went out at our house and the lantern function works great. The music clarity is solid and has ample bass. Looking forward to using it in the woods!
customer_reviews.author: Evan Price

customer_reviews.title: Works well, light is very bright mounted on bicycle ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, light is very bright mounted on bicycle handlebar. Allows Ride with GPS directions to come through clearly so no reading a map or cue sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Pretty solid piece of tech
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid piece of tech. Rugged, compact, and does what it should. The only thing negative I would say is sometimes the play button doesn't work but after a while it starts to again.
customer_reviews.author: Mario B.

customer_reviews.title: no bass tones
customer_reviews.text: slightly low sound . my ontz have better amplification .. bass tones are unidentifiable
customer_reviews.author: Adnan Naseem Khan

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth + Battery
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality sound and connects well. I almost never use the light portion,. but it is an excellent backup battery and bluetooth speaker.
customer_reviews.author: tnn

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! Great for camping trips or anywhere else! Only negative - must keep your phone fairly close to the device otherwise the Bluetooth doesn't get a good signal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it so many things on a small product . Great gift I wanna keep for my self
customer_reviews.author: Estefana Umanzor

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Second generation is rocking it! All in one right here
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Peters

customer_reviews.title: It's awsome! Have yet to use it on my ...
customer_reviews.text: It's awsome! Have yet to use it on my bike handle. It looks a bit more sensitive than the Buckshot.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Cleare

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the small
customer_reviews.text: Neat little flash light, speaker, n charger. Great sound for the small speaker
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound is good quality, haven't had a chance to try the ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good quality, haven't had a chance to try the light function yet.
customer_reviews.author: David Cole

customer_reviews.title: Defective product off the bat
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this product but I later realized I got a defected product right off the bat. Im pretty disappointed. The lamp feature worked fine. It was the bluetooth speaker function that did not work. The product would sync up with my mobile device but no sound came out of the buckshot pro. I tried charging it and after the 3 hour charging time frame the speaker still failed to work. The light would signal it was connected and on and connected to my phone but no sound. After trying to get it to work a bunch of times the speaker's red light just stayed on permanently.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker!  BAD STRAP!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great speaker!!! Only two stars because, the strap broke while on my bike overnight in the garage the first week I had it. What good is a speaker if you can't attach it?!! I've been using electrical tape... Still waiting for a call back from their customer service. 5 days and counting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but not all about that bass
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the idea of this for backpacking, but I was a little disappointed in the sound. It seemed only a little louder than the speakers built into my iPhone 4 and without any added bass. And I don't really need the flashlight feature since we already have headlamps. So it doesn't really seem worth the extra money and extra weight. I think I will just pick up a solar charger instead for my phone and use that for music. I am sending it back for that reason. It does seem well built and the Bluetooth connected quickly and easily, so it's a great product for some, unfortunately just not me.
customer_reviews.author: Sara P.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: could never figure out how to work the damn thing and it cost 80 dollars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good light, good sound
customer_reviews.text: The controls seem a little less responsive than I'd like, but I'm getting used to them. It's just the resistance of the rubber exterior. The sound is good, I've heard better but it does fine for outdoor purposes. The flashlight is ok, but the lantern or lamp mode is EXCELLENT, I use the higher setting for reading quite often. Full disclosure: I got this in the Warehouse Deals section where I get most items I question my need for. Totally worth the price there, it was tempting at full price.
customer_reviews.author: W. Schaeffer Tolliver

customer_reviews.title: Features
customer_reviews.text: Really nice sound. Plus the fact that it doubles as a charger is a nice feature. Drawback is they do not work at the same time. Still a really nice product for tbe money.
customer_reviews.author: JamesDll

customer_reviews.title: but overall I'm pretty happy. The straps break easily
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to hear in traffic, but overall I'm pretty happy. The straps break easily, so order extras.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Evans

customer_reviews.title: I love Outdoor Technologies
customer_reviews.text: Incredible product. I love Outdoor Technologies. It works exceptionally well. The speaker is loud and clear. The flashlight is sharp and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! This is exactly what I had been searching ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! This is exactly what I had been searching for. The light is far stronger than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Just a Techie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: stopped working after one charge. Company did return my money though.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone

customer_reviews.title: Had to return because defective
customer_reviews.text: The unit I was shipped did not operate properly. The buttons mostly failed to respond and operating the device was nearly impossible. To turn on I would have to repetitively press and hold the main button on average ten times before successfully turned on. I requested a replacement from Amazon and the replacement had the same issue, at which I gave up and requested a refund. Luckily Amazon's return procedure is fairly hassle free. From what little use I got the sound quality was decent and it did seem like a nice product, I would like to have an operating unit one day. The flashlight kicked out a surprising amount of light for what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic little speaker this is! It's light, but solid, very portable and sounds pretty decent for its size. The syncing with my phone couldn't have been any simpler. I haven't used it on my bicycle yet, but I have used it in the car so I could listen to podcasts. It also works as a flash light and a separate charger and to me those features alone make it worth the price. The only draw back is that it isn't very loud and sometimes even in the car it's a bit hard to hear, but I would still highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: MJZ

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but mighty
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this since it first came out. It’s reliable it sounds good. It hasn’t broken indicating that it’s well built. It also gets reasonably loud. It’s a great bargain. Get it
customer_reviews.author: Medina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: We are using this as just another wireless speaker in our home, hooking up our iPhones to it using Bluetooth, and it works great. My kids like that it has a flashlight attached, I like that I don't have to constantly charge it because it holds a long charge. I also like the automated voice confirmation that I am using it right! The sound is excellent for such a small device, and I think it will be great for camping trips too.
customer_reviews.author: Becs

customer_reviews.title: Do not depend on the flash light.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was the greatest until I was using it after being without power from Hurricane Matthew. The flashlight has left me stranded. After three nights, it no longer works. I would expect more. It was hard to turn on, as you had to hold it down and my hands are not quite that strong. Then it quit turning on.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The Outdoor Tech Buckshot Pro is a pretty cool tool. The flashlight is plenty bright, and has a nice diffused light for camping (like a nightlight), as well as a bright flashlight, and a strobe light. The speaker and mic are great. The battery charger works well. It has a nice feel to the grip. There's a special band that lets you add it to a bicycle or other surface. While I haven't thrown it around, it feels very durable. Overall, not inexpensive, but a great product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smerud

customer_reviews.title: Strong in its class for instant connectivity
customer_reviews.text: This speaker has one feature that sets it above a lot of similar speakers in this price range: the Bluetooth connects very quickly (no prompts or other to follow). The sound is comparable to most in this range ($70-100), good for its size, but won't be mistake for a larger or higher-priced system. Better flashlights can be found, but not with a speaker attached. It's a nice addition if you expect to use this speaker where it might come in handy. It won't replace a proper light, but it's handy and not totally a gimmick.
customer_reviews.author: Stepone

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after one summer
customer_reviews.text: I used this speaker for one summer, and it has stopped working. It will no longer charge or turn on. I used it for backyard BBQs and picnics, which are hardly opportunities for rough wear and tear. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: saboav

customer_reviews.title: For such a small speaker this baby packs a punch and is very rugged
customer_reviews.text: This isn't the loudest bluetooth speaker but for my needs I really enjoy it. It packs a punch and lasts a really long time. I use it on my bike with the red strap and the flashlight helps when i'm riding at night. I've used my weekly for about 9 months now and I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, tough quality but there's no way this ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, tough quality but there's no way this can be more than 10 feet away from the device it's connected to without breaking up. Their boast of 32' is totally off.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Gipe

product_meta.title: Outdoor Tech OT1351 Buckshot Pro 3-in-1 Rugged Wireless Bluetooth Speaker with Power Bank and 3-mode Flashlight (Gray)
product_meta.description: Color:GrayThe Buckshot Pro, 3-in-1, All Grown Up Bluetooth Speaker, Power Bank and Flash Light!
feature_bullets: Passive Bass Port for Bigger Sound
Wireless connectivity to any Bluetooth-enabled device

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars80 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
